UNIFIED_FLOW.title: NMWSO Digital Safety Resource Helper
UNIFIED_FLOW.description: Comprehensive interactive guide for Online Gender-Based Violence (OGBV), Harassment, Impersonation, and Doxxing.

q_situation_triage.question: Which of the following best describes your current situation?

options.0: Someone is making me feel unsafe online
options.1: My family member / friend / colleague is feeling unsafe online

q_main_category.question: Which of the following best describes what is making you feel unsafe online?

options.0: Images or videos of me online that shouldn't be
options.1: Someone is harassing or threatening me
options.3: Personal information or photos that I don't want public is circulating online

q_auth_check.question: Are you this person's legal guardian or do you have power of attorney on their behalf?

q_img_nature.question: Got it. I can help you take a few simple steps to feel safer. First, select which applies best to the images/videos:

options.0: I suspect the images were digitally produced, altered, or doctored (Deepfakes)
options.1: The images are humiliating, defamatory, or threatening
options.3: The images were obtained secretly or without my consent (Voyeurism)
options.4: The images contain intimate or explicit materials

q_danger_check.question: That is very unsettling. Are you in immediate danger?

options.1: No, but I'd like to feel safer

q_imp_method.question: How is this person impersonating you?

options.2: Using my address or phone number

q_main_category_rep.question: Which of the following best describes what is making them feel unsafe online?

options.0: Images or videos of them online that shouldn't be
options.1: Someone is harassing or threatening them
options.3: Personal information or photos they don't want public is circulating online

end_no_auth.title: Authorization Needed
end_no_auth.content: Got it. Unfortunately, you can't pursue any legal action on their behalf without proper authorization. However, we can help you understand what they might have access to and point you to additional non-legal resources.

links.0: View Non-Legal Support Resources

end_emergency.title: Emergency Action Required
end_emergency.content: Please find a safe space and contact the police right away. If you need sensitive assistance regarding gender-based issues, you can ask for your local VAWC Desk. If you fear for some reason contact with local police, contact PNP Anti-Cybercrime Group.

links.0: PNP Anti-Cybercrime Group

q_harass_details.question: Got it. I can help you take a few simple steps to feel safer. First, select all that apply:

options.0: Harassment involves repeated and unwanted contact via digital means
options.1: Harassment involves threats of physical, reputational, or financial harm
options.2: Harassment is directed to a woman and/or child
options.3: Harassment is coming from a current or former intimate partner

q_dox_identify.question: Does this info identify you? (name, address, phone, workplace, IDs, accounts)

q_dox_identify_2.question: Does this info identify you? (name, address, phone, workplace, IDs, accounts)

options.0: I suspect the images were digitally produced, altered, or doctored (Deepfakes)
options.1: The images are humiliating, defamatory, or threatening
options.3: The images were obtained secretly or without my consent (Voyeurism)
options.4: The images contain intimate or explicit materials

q_danger_check_2.question: That is very unsettling. Are you in immediate danger?

options.1: No, but I'd like to feel safer

q_imp_method_2.question: How is this person impersonating you?

options.2: Using my address or phone number

menu_actions_img.title: What You Can Do
menu_actions_img.content: There are a few things you can do to help feel safer and simplify things. Click one of the options below to explore more:

links.0: Contact Law Enforcement / File Criminal Complaint
links.1: Submit a Takedown Request to the Platform

q_dox_consent.question: Do you have any reason to suspect that the individual or entity circulating this information has either your CONSENT or a LEGAL BASIS to do so?

end_dox_frustrating.title: Privacy Advice
end_dox_frustrating.content: That is frustrating. Even if it doesn't strictly identify you, you can try to protect your privacy by reporting the content to the platform and adjusting your privacy settings.

end_dox_check_legal.title: Check Legal Basis
end_dox_check_legal.content: Sometimes, individuals or entities may have received your consent (e.g., via Terms of Service) or have a legal basis (public officials). If you are unsure, you may need to consult a lawyer.

q_dox_15_days.question: Have you taken measures to resolve this directly with the violator/platform AND has it been 15 days since you attempted to resolve it?

options.2: Yes, but I have not heard back / not resolved

end_dox_check_legal_2.title: Check Legal Basis

end_dox_wait.title: Exhaustion of Remedies
end_dox_wait.content: Generally, you can't file a complaint with the Data Privacy commission until you've attempted to resolve the issue directly with the person/entity and waited 15 days.
